alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, Dougherty, southeastern Clay, northeastern Mitchell, Baker, Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia, northwestern Colquitt and southwestern Worth Counties in south central Georgia through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 554 PM EDT/454 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Gaines to near Sylvester. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Newton, Morgan, Blakely, Sylvester, Putney, Camilla, Moultrie, Albany, Edison, Arlington, Baconton, Doerun, Columbia, Leary, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Poulan, Walker, Douglasville and Schley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
